name: Birthday Cake - Blow out the candles
name_original: Birthday Cake - Blow out the candles
description:
**IOSAwards Best Birthday App Winner**

**Awarded Best Birthday App by Bdaytimer**

“If you got here by following the link sent by your friend, please proceed with downloading and installing the app. Your personalized greeting is awaiting you.”

Come and get your own birthday cake and blow out the candles. Hope your wishes will come true :)

You can select your favorite cake in between many specially designed cakes and customize it by placing toppings and candles. Then write your name on the cake. Your cake is now ready for you to blow out the candles.

Just blow on your iPhone to put the candles out

And the party starts !!!

Joyful music is playing, confetti is falling and balloons are flying.

Be quick and pop as many balloons as you can till the music ends

Is it your friend’s birthday? Why won’t you send them a personalized cake with a personalized greeting? You can customize the cake just the way your beloved ones like, write their names on the cake, put as many candles as their age and record your personal greetings.

They will receive the specially customized cake for them alongside your recorded voice message and happy birthday song selected by you.
They can blow out the candles and enjoy popping the balloons while listening to happy birthday song selected by you.

You can send the customized cake with a personalized greeting to your friends via email/SMS/Facebook

Many cool features are on their way

Stay tuned
